heading: HR00589
0: A RESOLUTION COMMENDING THE DEPARTMENT OF FOREIGN AFFAIRS, DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION, AND THE PHILIPPINE DELEGATION TO THE 31ST INTERNATIONAL MARITIME ORGANIZATION (IMO) ASSEMBLY FOR REPRESENTING THE COUNTRY AND ENSURING THAT THE PHILIPPINES IS REFLECTED TO THE COUNCIL OF THE INTERNATIONAL MARITIME ORGANIZATION (IMO) UNDER CATEGORY C FOR THE BIENNIUM 2020 TO 2021
status: Pending with the Committee on TRANSPORTATION since 2019-12-11
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00589
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION COMMENDING THE DEPARTMENT OF FOREIGN AFFAIRS, DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION, AND THE PHILIPPINE DELEGATION TO THE 31ST INTERNATIONAL MARITIME ORGANIZATION (IMO) ASSEMBLY FOR REPRESENTING THE COUNTRY AND ENSURING THAT THE PHILIPPINES IS REFLECTED TO THE COUNCIL OF THE INTERNATIONAL MARITIME ORGANIZATION (IMO) UNDER CATEGORY C FOR THE BIENNIUM 2020 TO 2021
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : SARMIENTO, EDGAR S.
DATE FILED : 2019-12-09
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON TRANSPORTATION ON 2019-12-11
